titles.title: An original bill to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 2020 for military activities of the Department of Defense, for military construction, and for defense activities of the Department of Energy, and for other purposes.
Essential National Security Authorities Act for Fiscal Year 2020
Essential National Security Authorities Act for Fiscal Year 2020
Military Construction Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2020
Military Construction Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2020
Essential National Security Authorities Act for Fiscal Year 2020

action.text: Committee on Armed Services. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Inhofe. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 279.
